Container.Name: ContainerNetwork-AutoFix
Container.Overview:
ContainerNetwork AutoFix (CNAF) - Automatically recreates Docker containers that depend on a master container's network when the master container restarts. Perfect for containers routing through VPN containers like GluetunVPN.
When a master container (e.g., VPN) restarts and gets a new container ID, dependent containers using --net=container: lose network connectivity. CNAF automatically detects and recreates those dependent containers.
Features: - Auto-detects dependent containers - Preserves container states (running/stopped) - Smart waiting for VPN establishment - Automatic log rotation - Zero manual configuration needed

Config.Name: Master Container Name
Config.Description: Select your VPN/master container from the dropdown. For custom container names, click EDIT and enter the name in the Value field.

Config.Name: Restart Wait Time
Config.Description: Seconds to wait after master container restarts before recreating dependents (allows VPN to establish)

Config.Name: Max Log Lines
Config.Description: Maximum number of log lines to keep (automatic rotation)

Config.Name: Max Retries
Config.Description: Number of times to retry finding master container on startup

Config.Name: Retry Delay
Config.Description: Seconds between retry attempts when finding master container
